import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Pencil, Trash2, Plus, Search } from 'lucide-react'; import './App.css'; // Import the CSS file const API_URL = 'http://localhost:3001/api'; const CrudApp = () => { // ... (keep all your existing state and function declarations) return (

CRUD Operations

{/* Read Operation Card */}

Read Operations

{/* Search Form */}
setSearchId(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter item ID" className="form-input" />
{searchResult && (

ID: {searchResult.id}

Name: {searchResult.name}

Description: {searchResult.description}

)}
{items.map((item) => (

ID: {item.id}

Name: {item.name}

Description: {item.description}

))}
{/* Create Operation Card */}

Create New Item

setCreateFormData({ ...createFormData, name: e.target.value })} placeholder="Name" className="form-input" required /> setCreateFormData({ ...createFormData, description: e.target.value })} placeholder="Description" className="form-input" required />
{/* Update Operation Card */}

Update Item

setUpdateFormData({ ...updateFormData, id: e.target.value })} placeholder="Item ID" className="form-input" required /> setUpdateFormData({ ...updateFormData, name: e.target.value })} placeholder="New Name" className="form-input" required /> setUpdateFormData({ ...updateFormData, description: e.target.value })} placeholder="New Description" className="form-input" required />
{/* Delete Operation Card */}

Delete Item

{items.map((item) => (

ID: {item.id}

Name: {item.name}

))}
); }; export default CrudApp;
